entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 70%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 70 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
